task_prefix: Dataset for predicting whether images on Internet pages are advertisements. Features encode image geometry, URL phrases, anchor text, and surrounding text to classify images as ads or non-ads. Each example contains 3 features. Ad blocking.

column_descriptions.continuous_features: 3 features encoding image geometry (height, width, aspect ratio)
column_descriptions.binary_features: 1555 features indicating presence of specific words/phrases in URL, image URL, alt text, anchor text, and surrounding text
column_descriptions.missing_interpretation: Missing values should be interpreted as 'unknown'

class_description: Classes: 'ad' (Image is an advertisement), 'nonad' (Image is not an advertisement)
